description:
A component for displaying linear progress. The progress can be displayed as a percentage (default) or
as a counter (x / y).

props.name: value
props.description:
If no total is provided (default) the current % completion is expressed as a %, e.g. 0.15 = 15%,
In the case of a total being provided this is the count of items from the total, i.e. the 'x' in 'x / y '.

props.name: total
props.description: When the total is provided the display is 'x / y' where total is the 'y' in 'x / y'.

props.name: label
props.description: A label to display above the progress bar

props.name: alternateColor
props.description: The alternate color for displaying the progress as a gradient

props.name: size
props.description: The component size, NeonSize.Small or NeonSize.Medium

props.name: output
props.description: Display the text output indicating the current state of progress

props.name: completedIconColor
props.description: Specify the icon color (default = alternate-color || color)

props.name: decimals
props.description: The decimals to use for rounding
